node.title: Walmart's Early Black Friday Event: The Best Homeware Deals on Kitchen Appliances, Vacuums and More
node.alt: The exterior of a Walmart store in North Bergen, New Jersey, seen on August 23, 2020. The retail giant has unveiled early Black Friday deals, including discounts on various home goods.
node.description: Bag early Black Friday discounts on homeware including an air fryer, the iRobot Roomba vacuum and other home goods.
node.content:
["Walmart has kicked off its early Black Friday sale.", "These advance discounts mean you don't have to wait until the end of the month to pick up some new products at a reduced price.", "Here we look at some of the best early Black Friday deals for various home goods.", "
iRobot Roomba 670 Vacuum
", "Get the iRobot Roomba 670 robot vacuum for $177 (reduced from $329.99). Equipped with Wi-Fi connectivity, the advanced vacuum can be controlled using your smartphone via an app. It is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.", "The device features a unique cleaning system that's designed to \"loosen, lift and suction everything,\" from small particles to large debris on carpets and hard floors, Walmart describes.", "Buy it at Walmart.", "", "
A person using a cordless vacuum cleaner in a kitchen.
", "
Tineco PWRHERO 11 Cordless Vacuum
", "Get this high-powered cordless vacuum for $125 (reduced from $199). It features a 450W motor and up to 120W of suction power. The device works on multiple surfaces and is good for picking up pet hair. ", "Buy it at Walmart.", "
Kamado Joes Charcoal Grill
", "Bag a nearly 50 percent discount on this red Joe Jr. 13.5 inch charcoal grill from Kamado Joes, priced at $249 (reduced from $499.99). Weighing 68 pounds and with a 148.5 square inch cooking surface, the grill's thick ceramic body locks in heat, moisture and flavor, while its heat deflector plate allows for more flexible cooking using indirect heat, according to Walmart.", "Buy it at Walmart.", "", "
A person using a barbecue grill. Bag an early Black Friday deal on an outdoor grill at Walmart.
", "
Gourmia Digital Air Fryer
", "Get the Gourmia 6-Quart Digital Air Fryer for $49. The device fries food with air for up to 80 percent less fat than deep frying, according to Walmart. It features 12 different functions, including air fry, bake and dehydrate.", "Buy it at Walmart.", "", "
An air fryer device on a kitchen table.
", "
Mainstays Jumbo Roasting Pan
", "Save nearly 50 percent on this 18-inch roasting pan and lid from Mainstays, priced at $29.98 (reduced from $49). The pan, which is heat-resistant up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, comes with a stainless steel basting rack.", "Buy it at Walmart.", "
Ninja Ice Cream Maker
", "Get the Ninja CREAMi NC300 for $149 (reduced from $169). The device is great for making ice cream as well as sorbets, milkshakes and other drinks/frozen treats. Its containers, lids and paddle are top-rack dishwasher safe.", "Buy it at Walmart.", "", "
Strawberry ice cream served in an ice cream maker.
", "
SEI Paxvi Industrial Bakers Rack
", "Get this farmhouse-inspired storage rack for $130 (reduced from $193.80). Built with rustic metalwork and dark pine shelves, the rack is great for storing your microwave, toaster oven and coffee maker, as well spices, recipe books and other kitchen items. ", "Buy it at Walmart.", "
Stemless Wine Tumbler Pack
", "Get this pack of four 16-ounce stemless wine glasses, which come with lids and straws, for $19.98. Featuring a textured matte finish, these wine glasses are made from a \"long lasting\" and \"shatter and impact resistant\" plastic that's also BPA-free. ", "Buy it at Walmart.", "
Mainstays Stainless Steel Kitchen Garbage Can
", "This 14.2 Gallon (54 Liter) semi-round waste bin from Mainstays is available for $29 (reduced from $39.98). Made of \"high-quality durable stainless steel,\" this garbage can comes with a foot pedal for hands-free usage.", "Buy it at Walmart.", "
Better Homes & Gardens Wood Frame
", "Get a discount of over 50 percent on this hanging wood frame from Better Homes & Gardens, which is priced at $18.99 (reduced from $46.75). It is made with a natural wood tray base and three sturdy metal clips that can hold three 4-inch by 4-inch photos, artwork or other documents. The frame spans 8.66 inches in height, 19.7 inches in length and 1.77 inches in depth. It comes with attached hangers on its back and can be installed with screws or wall hooks (which are not included).", "Buy it at Walmart.", "
Sanus Television Wall Mount
", "The SANUS Vue Point FLT1 wall mount for televisions is available for $39 (reduced from $77.99). The mount extends 5.02 inches from the wall, providing an increased tilt range for your television and allowing easy access to cables. The viewing angle can also be easily adjusted downward by 12 degrees to reduce glare. The mount fits most 32\" to 70\" televisions weighing up to 80 lbs.", "Buy it at Walmart.", "", "
The exterior of a Walmart store in North Bergen, New Jersey, seen on August 23, 2020. The retail giant has unveiled early Black Friday deals, including discounts on various home goods.
"]
